snippet.title: Puyo Puyo (Puyo Puyo Box) - Scenario Mode (Easy)
snippet.description:
Couldn't find a gameplay video on the version of Puyo Puyo in Puyo Puyo Box, so I had to make this.

Puyo Puyo Box is a compilation of modes from Puyo Puyo games, but also contains original content. The game contains a port of Puyo Puyo, based on the Mega Drive. It has some differences, some of them being reminiscent of Tsu. The easy difficulty here is harder than the original, as the dropspeed was too fast near the end. However, I still managed to get through the stages very quickly.
